com.twilio.chat

Class ErrorInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twilio.chat.ErrorInfo

  • public class ErrorInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a Chat Error object.

    This object encapsulates information about an SDK error and is passed around to listener callbacks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CANNOT_GET_MESSAGE_BY_INDEX
      This code is signaled to the listener of Messages#getMessageByIndex() if general error occurs and message could not be retrieved.
      static int CHANNEL_NOT_SYNCHRONIZED
      This code is signaled when an attempt is made to query channel members or messages without synchronizing first.
      static int CLIENT_ERROR
      This status is set if error occured in the SDK and is not related to network operations.
      static int MISMATCHING_TOKEN_UPDATE
      This code is signaled to the listener of ChatClient#updateToken() if updated token does not match the original token.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorInfo(int errorStatus, int errorCode, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Create ErrorInfo from status, error code and corresponding message.
      ErrorInfo(int errorCode, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Create ErrorInfo from error code and corresponding message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCode()
      Returns unique code for this error.
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      Returns error message of this error.
      int getStatus()
      Get error category as a classifier.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Convert ErrorInfo to string representation, for example for logging.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • CLIENT_ERROR

        public static int CLIENT_ERROR
        This status is set if error occured in the SDK and is not related to network operations.

      • CANNOT_GET_MESSAGE_BY_INDEX

        public static int CANNOT_GET_MESSAGE_BY_INDEX
        This code is signaled to the listener of Messages#getMessageByIndex() if general error occurs and message could not be retrieved.

      • MISMATCHING_TOKEN_UPDATE

        public static int MISMATCHING_TOKEN_UPDATE
        This code is signaled to the listener of ChatClient#updateToken() if updated token does not match the original token.

        This error often indicates that you have updated token with a different identity, which is not allowed - you cannot change client identity mid-flight.

        If this error is returned, you should shutdown and re-create ChatClient.

      • CHANNEL_NOT_SYNCHRONIZED

        public static int CHANNEL_NOT_SYNCHRONIZED
        This code is signaled when an attempt is made to query channel members or messages without synchronizing first.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ErrorInfo

        public ErrorInfo(int errorCode,
                 java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Create ErrorInfo from error code and corresponding message. The status will be set to #CLIENT_ERROR.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - Error code.
        errorMessage - Error description.

      • ErrorInfo

        public ErrorInfo(int errorStatus,
                 int errorCode,
                 java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Create ErrorInfo from status, error code and corresponding message.
        Parameters:
        errorStatus - Error status code.
        errorCode - Error unique code.
        errorMessage - Error description.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
        Get error category as a classifier. Local client errors get status 0, network related errors have their HTTP error code as a status.
        Returns:
        Error status.

      • getCode

        public int getCode()
        Returns unique code for this error.
        Returns:
        Unique code for the error.

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Returns error message of this error.
        Returns:
        Error message of the error.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Convert ErrorInfo to string representation, for example for logging.

        Returns:
        String representation of ErrorInfo object.
